price: ለዚያ በሰማያትና በምድር የተደበቀውን ለሚያወጣው፣ የምትሸሽጉትንና የምትገ ልጹትንም ሁሉ ለሚያውቀው አላህ እንዳይሰግዱ (ሰይጣን አግዷቸዋል)፡፡
arabic: أَلَّاۤ يَسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي يُخۡرِجُ ٱلۡخَبۡءَ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُخۡفُونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: allā yasjudū lillahi alladhī yukh'riju al-khaba-a fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayaʿlamu mā tukh'fūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
